column1: Little Goat Diner////Little goat latte. What they serve is a little on a heavy side with the spice mix but still amazing. On a cold day
column3: sweet cream topping and the fragrance of spice take you to another place. Get a goat latte or the little goat latte. Stumptown beans they use are top notch
column4: so any coffee drink should be on par with the Allis or La Colombe. But if you like your black
column5: the latter is my first choice in the immediate area.
